Naked truth needs no shift: or, an answer to a libellous sheet, entituled, The Quakers last shift found out Penn, William, 1644-1718.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
by Andrew Sowle, [London : 1674]
Dated and signed at end: The 11th of the 7th month, 1674. By William Penn. Imprint from Wing. Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
